summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2016 FORD F-150. WHILE DRIVING AT AN UNKNOWN SPEED, THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED AND THE CHECK ENGINE WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS PLACED IN NEUTRAL AND COASTED TO THE SIDE OF THE ROAD. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO THE DEALER (RUSS-MILNE FORD, CLINTON TOWNSHIP, MICHIGAN) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL WAS STUCK TO THE CARPET. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE, BUT DID NOT PROVIDE A CLEAR EXPLANATION OF WHY IT OCCURRED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 66,000.
